findings.title: Centralized risk
findings.description: The function addLiquidity() sends owner addresses as a parameter, which can lead to the accumulation of a huge portion of LP tokens on one centralized address, making it unsecure.

findings.title: Calculation error
findings.description: The function swapTokens() in GovernanceToken contract has possibility to send wrong BNB/ETH to marketing address due to incorrect calculation.

findings.title: Out of gas exception
findings.description: The functions includeInReward() and _getCurrentSupply() use loops to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list and evaluate total supply respectively. These functions can be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long excluded addresses list.
